Class Gui

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
org.mio.progettoingsoft.views.gui.Gui
All Implemented Interfaces:
PropertyChangeListener, EventListener, View
public class Gui extends javafx.application.Application implements View
GUI class: we decided to use the JavaFX framework the GUI (as well as the TUI) is implemented as a property change listener it has been made to make the GUI change with the game state, probably there will be more properties (for example a change in the circuit)

    • propertyChange

      public void propertyChange(PropertyChangeEvent evt)
      method called when a property changes, at the moment is used only in response to game state changes and circuit changes
      Specified by:
      propertyChange in interface PropertyChangeListener
      Parameters:
      evt - A PropertyChangeEvent object describing the event source and the property that has changed.

    • start

      public void start(javafx.stage.Stage stage)
